name: Selfish Wish
description:
We were locked in an escape room by an evil ghost on halloween, help!

Synopsis

We were just trying to have a fun Halloween night!
Despite the fear that something bad would end up happening,
the night was going well, but apparently a ghost had other plans for us.
It seems that now we need to solve a series of puzzles to escape
and I really want to get out of here before midnight!
How should I act?
Should I put others to do dangerous things for me
or do everything possible so that others are not in danger?

Features

- A short game with around 2k+ words
- Visual novel with escape room elements
- Minigames (Match cards, Hunting words, Hangman, Quiz)
- User choices that can lead to 4 different endings
- Available in English and Brazilian Portuguese
Note: This version has no save system.
